title: New & Video: MONEY – Bluebell Fields
body:
**MONEY**, at least until now, have dealt almost exclusively in despair and sorrow.

There’s beauty in every minute aspect of their work, remembering every girl and every boy you’ve ever loved, but it all seems to be born out of a very real sense of agony.

_ Bluebell Fields_, is remarkable in so many ways, but its great successes come from its subtle detachment from what **MONEY** made such great strides to build. It is the first breath of a new life and it tastes really fucking good.

**MONEY**‘s debut LP is due out late this summer via Bella Union Records.
